question:
Which among the following about the Kankut system is/ are correct?
1. It was introduced in 1824 by replacing Batai
2. The share of the government was collected in cash
3. It gave relief to the officials from performing doubled duties
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: The Batai system was replaced by the Kankut system in the year 1824. As per the Kankut system, the share of the government was collected in cash which was previously done with some proportion of crops in the case of the Batai system. It reduced the inspection duty of the concerned officer.
